requirements_en.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel i5 (4th gen or newer)
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 650
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 8 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: MORTAL ADVOCATE is a handcrafted indie game built with narrative and atmosphere in mind. While it should run smoothly on most modern systems, performance may vary depending on your hardware and background applications. We've done our best to keep things optimized, but if you're running into issues, feel free to reach out via the community hub. We're a small team (just a single fungus, really), so your understanding and support means the world. Thank you for giving this strange little story a place in your memory.
